Race.SpecificTitle: PW Hospital Serv. Dist. No. 1 -- 5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Hospital Service District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage)
Race.FullText: Shall Morehouse Parish Hospital Service District No. 1, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to levy an additional five (5) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $758,730 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of operating, maintaining and improving hospital facilities within said District?
